SEARCH
Package server.controller

Class MatchHandler

java.lang.Object
server.controller.MatchHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, MatchHandlerObserver, MatchObserver
public class MatchHandler extends Object implements Runnable, MatchHandlerObserver, MatchObserver
Controller according to the MVC model. Authoritative server, therefore the only entity making decisions about the match. Contains references to the model and performs changes according to the logic of the game. An instance of MatchHandler exists for every Match created by the Server
